title: Wishing Upon a Star: A Tale of the Holocaust
description: First Edition, 2000, first printing, SIGNED BY THE AUTHOR at the top of the title page (we didn't scan the full page with signature to keep from cracking the spine at that point), an otherwise new, unread, unopened, unmarked trade softcover, from Blackmore & Blackmore. By Eline Hoekstra Dresden. 95 pages. ISBN 0-9666244-1-6.
author: Eline Hoekstra Dresden
